p: In addition, HPLC-MS analyses of the methanol extract of Ferula drudeana roots confirmed the presence of luteolin-7-Î²- d-glucoside (cynaroside) ( 29), cynarin ( 30) and chlorogenic acid ( 31) as bioactive polar metabolites [ 54]. Chemical constituents of the F. drudeana were highly diverse; such chemical and pharmacological diversity is unique among the investigated Ferula species.
